about_the_game:
“Will you accept your fate or forge a new destiny?”

In the not-so-distant future, something revolutionary has been discovered: MANA. It powers everything. It has mystical properties, and it seems to be in never-ending supply. Robocorp has created the world's first MANA-powered robots. The world is peaceful. For now…

Join Pascal and a wide cast of characters as you unravel the mystery behind MANA, Robocorp, and a mysterious figure who claims to be from the future. Dive into an unforgettable story that intertwines fate and self-discovery. Experience the past as you try to change the future. 

Key Features: 

Turn-Based Minigame Combat

Engage in turn-based combat where each of the player’s and enemy’s attacks are minigames. Whether that be dodging projectiles, pressing buttons in time with music, or memorising colours, minigames provide a fresh twist on the classic turn-based RPG formula.

Explore a Vibrant Solarpunk World

Enter a futuristic world fuelled by MANA-powered technologies. Explore four different areas ranging from peaceful villages, lush forests, and bustling urban cities.

Unlock Future Memories, Unlock New Attacks!

Memory crystals can be discovered throughout the world. Learn more about the future, and use those memories to power new attacks and defeat the machines along your journey.
